Burn(address,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when variable debt is burnt

params.amount: The amount of debt being burned
params.user: The user which debt has been burned

params.index: The last index of the reserve*
params.onBehalfOf: The address of the user on which behalf minting has been performed

params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve*
params.user: The user which debt is burnt

getScaledUserBalanceAndSupply(address).details: Returns the scaled balance of the user and the scaled total supply.

returns._0: The scaled balance of the user
returns._1: The scaled balance and the scaled total supply*

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints debt token to the `onBehalfOf` address

params.amount: The amount of debt being minted
params.index: The variable debt index of the reserve
params.onBehalfOf: The address receiving the debt tokens
params.user: The address receiving the borrowed underlying, being the delegatee in case of credit delegate, or same as `onBehalfOf` otherwise

returns._0: `true` if the the previous balance of the user is 0*

scaledBalanceOf(address).details: Returns the scaled balance of the user. The scaled balance is the sum of all the updated stored balance divided by the reserve's liquidity index at the moment of the update

params.user: The user whose balance is calculated

returns._0: The scaled balance of the user*

scaledTotalSupply().details: Returns the scaled total supply of the variable debt token. Represents sum(debt/index)

userdoc.notice: Defines the basic interface for a variable debt token.*
